column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The stately entrance
column2: guarded by proud and imposing stone lions
column3: is your first glimpse of the glories that await you inside this astonishing monument to art.  Take your time and peruse the various collections. My favorite part of the institute is the impressive collection of impressionists and post impressionists.  And while the newly added modern wing may not be everyone's cup of tea
column4: it is still worth checking out
column5: even if only to serve as a comparison to some of the earlier works on display.  And
column7: don't forget to stop and see some of the more famous works that call Chicago home
